outputs.output_descr: This Output  will help in advocating for the utilization of the Integrated National Development Information System (INDIS), which is a database providing information on financial & physical progress and results of development projects and programmes.

project_descr: The project is to support the strategic positioning of DPMM by strengthening the engagement of stakeholders, institutionalizing procedures and strengthening the incentive and accountability mechanisms for greater adoption of good practices.
project_title: Strategic Positioning of the Department of PMM Sri Lanka
